<section id="main" class="blog">
    <div class="container">
        <div class="row justify-content-center">
            <div class="col-lg-6">
                <!-- section title -->
                <div class="title text-center">
                    <h1>Bian Lab </h1>
                    <b style="font-size: large; color: gray;">Sleep and Neural Development </b>
                </div>

                <!-- end of section title -->
            </div>
        </div>

        <!-- Art sentence -->
        <h3 style="text-align: center; font-family: Kristen ITC;"><i>"We do interesting science. "</i></h3><br />
        <!-- end of art sentence -->

        <!-- Concise introduction -->
        <p style="font-size: large; ">Nearly all animals engage in the act of sleep. As Allan Rechschaffen famously
            stated, “If sleep doesn't serve an absolutely vital function, it is the greatest mistake evolution ever
            made.” In the Bian lab, we seek to answer why we sleep from
            a developmental perspective and by investigating sleep and the underlying neural mechanisms in the
            developing mice. <a href="research.html">Read more…</a></p>
        <!-- end of concise introduction -->

        <br />
        <br />
